comments.body:
Perhaps before this loop, or even at the file level:
```
signs = {
    d: (+1,) if dt in np.typecodes['UnsignedInteger'] else (+1, -1)
    for d in dt
}
```

And then `itertools.product(signs[dt1], signs[dt2])` below, which removes the `continue`s

This test fails on ppc64. 

I think I'm going to add `@dec.skipif(platform.machine().startswith("ppc64"))` here.
Not quite PEP8, but looks better. Lots of these around, so not going to worry about it.
